MacIntuneManifest.Name: SCR-SYS-100 - Device Rename
MacIntuneManifest.Description: Automatically renames Mac devices using a standardized naming convention based on enrollment type (ADE/BYOD), device model type (MBA/MBP/iMac/etc), serial number, and detected country code via IP geolocation. Differentiates between corporate (ABM-enrolled) and personal (manually-enrolled) devices with configurable prefixes.
